prompt: Design a dark-themed calendar page with a black background and elegant typography. Show 'December 2024' as a header with silver/white arrows, light gray weekday labels, and a 7x6 grid of rounded dark gray date cells. Highlight today (15th) in orange, mark events (8, 22, 28) with orange dots, gray out overflow dates, and add an orange floating action button with a white plus icon.
